EmailTemplate.name: Onboarding Form Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus: Required details for pre-onboarding
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Hope you're doing well!
We appreciate you joining us at Cloud Peritus and look forward to your association with us.
As part of our onboarding formalities, we require you to provide some details. Please click here to access the pre-onboarding portal.
Please make sure to upload all the documents and fill in all the details. If you are unable to provide any of the documents or details, please send an email to hr.hyderabad@cloudperitus.com with the reason.
Once you fill in all the details and submit, we will cross check and verify the details provided at our end and will update you if we require any further information.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
